channel.title: Client problem , help me please!
channel.description:
So My client is working fine for me, but when i putted it to my forums and people downloaded it, then they click run.bat and the client not working, but works on me..
So what's the problem? Thats the client download, if oyu dont what i mean, downloadit and help then
http://rapidshare.com/files/161977610/HiddenScape_-_Client.rar.html
Help me please. Problem.
